title: Upgrade Gems
body:
Context
===
Code keeps moving forward and we must stay up to date

What
===
Find a [gem](https://github.com/consul/consul/blob/master/Gemfile) that is [obsolete](https://rubygems.org/) and [upgrade it](https://bundler.io/v1.16/guides/updating_gems.html)

Why
===
For security, quality and maintainability

How
===
Check out the [release notes](https://github.com/thoughtbot/factory_bot_rails/releases) of that gem version and apply, if any, the changes required for the upgrade

Here is an example template to submit a PR:

_Title_
Upgrade gem _name_ to version _x_

_Description_
Previous version X (link to changelog of version X)
New version Y (link to changelog of version Y)

_Upgrade Changes_
None, or description of changes applied

_Notes_
None, or anything special to take into account
  
Notes
===
This is a forever-opened issue üòå

Just go ahead and send a PR üëç
